CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y procps wget net-tools cron && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

CmdLine: cd /matrix && wget https://github.com/MatrixAINetwork/GMAN_CLIENT/raw/master/MAINNET/0816/linux/gman https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MatrixAINetwork/GMAN_CLIENT/master/MAINNET/0816/MANGenesis.json https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MatrixAINetwork/GMAN_CLIENT/master/MAINNET/0816/man.json && chmod a+x gman && alias man="/matrix/gman attach /matrix/chaindata/gman.ipc"
